House Wines.name: Red House Wine
House Wines.description: A classic red blend with rich fruit flavors.

House Wines.name: White House Wine
House Wines.description: A crisp and refreshing white blend with citrus notes.

House Wines.name: Rosé House Wine
House Wines.description: Light and fruity with refreshing strawberry hints.

Red Wines.name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Red Wines.description: Full-bodied with black fruit and oak undertones.

Red Wines.name: Merlot
Red Wines.description: Soft and velvety, showcasing ripe red fruit flavors.

Red Wines.name: Pinot Noir
Red Wines.description: Light-bodied with cherry and earthy notes.

Red Wines.name: Malbec
Red Wines.description: Rich and robust with plum and blackberry flavors.

Red Wines.name: Syrah
Red Wines.description: Bold and spicy with dark berry and pepper notes.

Red Wines.name: Zinfandel
Red Wines.description: Jammy and rich with raspberry and spice hints.

White Wines.name: Chardonnay
White Wines.description: Buttered toast and tropical fruit notes on this oaked delight.

White Wines.name: Sauvignon Blanc
White Wines.description: Crisp and zesty with citrus and green apple aromas.

White Wines.name: Riesling
White Wines.description: Sweet and floral with hints of peach and honey.

White Wines.name: Pinot Grigio
White Wines.description: Light and refreshing with crisp pear and melon notes.

White Wines.name: Gewürztraminer
White Wines.description: Aromatic with lychee, rose, and spice undertones.

Rosé.name: Provence Rosé
Rosé.description: Dry and delicate with floral and berry undertones.

Rosé.name: California Rosé
Rosé.description: Bright and fruity with watermelon and raspberry flavors.

Rosé.name: Spanish Rosé
Rosé.description: Fresh and lively with hints of citrus and strawberry.

Sparkling.name: Prosecco
Sparkling.description: A bubbly Italian favorite with hints of apple and pear.

Sparkling.name: Champagne Brut
Sparkling.description: Classic French sparkling with notes of brioche and citrus.

Sparkling.name: Cava
Sparkling.description: Spanish sparkling wine with crisp green apple and lemon zest.

Sparkling.name: Rosé Sparkling
Sparkling.description: Elegant bubbles with fresh red fruit and floral aromas.
